name: Soul stealer (Jammingjack99)
description:
Welcome to soul stealer

-PLEASE READ ALL-

How to play

arrows/wasd, to move

mouse to aim

click to shoot

defeat enemy's go through door

DOORS ARE NOT ACCESABLE IN BOSS FIGHTS UNTILL BOSS IS DEFEATED

Note - Doors are invisible just head towards the exit.

Story

You are a blob trapped in a dungeon

when you defeat a boss you merge with it and become stronger together.
